<FONT color="#000000" size="6">*Icon Categories*</FONT>

*<--- Here in the left menu you see the Icon Categories you can choose between.* _Click_ on the one you believe the icon you are looking for is in. You can then browse the icons sorted further into sub-categories, you can read the full descriptions and also search for icons based on tags. Another way to find icons is by *[http://code.google.com/p/google-maps-icons/downloads/list using the "Icon search" page]*.
